description: The Mirelurker Hatchling is a small, amphibious creature that lurks in swamps and murky waters. Its slimy, mud-colored skin allows it to blend seamlessly with its environment. Despite its size, it is fiercely territorial and will attack anything that comes near its nesting grounds.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The Mirelurker Hatchling can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Camouflage
traits.description: The Mirelurker Hatchling has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spit Poison
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute.
